caption.text:
Have been loving my quick soups, from this recipe provided below, butternut soup, beet and parsnip, and so many others. Let me know how you like this super green soup and I’ll take photos of the other recipes and post them soon! Also, if you want a detox soup take out the coconut sugar! :) PS if you make any of my recipes tag me and I’ll share them! ❤️
.
Supe Green Soup (3-4 servings) 
1 cup of chopped asparagus 
1 cup of chopped celery 
1 cup of fennel bulb 
1/2 a cup of fennel stock and leaves 
2 large hand fulls of chopped kale 
5-6 garlic cloves
1/2 a cup of chopped onions 
1/2 a cup of fresh mint
2 thumbs of ginger 
2 tbsp of oil
3 tbsp of a cup of lime juice
1 tbsp of sweetener of choice (optional) 
1 tbsp of apple cider vinegar (ACV) 
1 1/2 tsp of salt or to taste 
1 1/2 cups of vegetable stock (low sodium) 
1/3-1/2 a cup of water .
.
Directions 
Wash and chop all veggies

Heat up pot (med-high), add oil and onions. Sauté for 5 min. Then add your ginger, garlic, and fennel bulb. Sauté for 5 min.

Add your asparagus, celery, fennel bulb, and sauté for another 5 min. Lower heat and add your kale mix well. Turn off heat.

Then add your sautéed veggies to a high-speed blender, plus your fresh mint, veg stock, water, sweetener, ACV, and salt. Blend until desired consistency. I tried both smooth and chunky and they are both delicious. At the end add your lime juice, slight blend or mix again. 
Topped with yogurt, black pepper, and cilantro. Enjoy.
